channel.title: Making npcs unattakable
channel.description:
Is there a way to use the following code and make it work for the combat level instead of HP? [code] int EnemyHP2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].HP; [/code]
I have tried: int Enemycombat = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].combat; But this doesn't work. :[ I get a error saying cannot find symbol ( .combat; )

item.title: Making npcs unattakable
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Is there a way to use the following code and make it work for the combat level instead of HP?

int EnemyHP2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].HP;

I have tried:
